artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: John Boydell
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin't. / No. 156. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Published Sept'r. 2d. 1776 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. title: A Herdsman Driving Cattle to a River
